tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnant Women Counseling,Pregnancy Scan,Labor and Delivery,
review:
I have been consulting Dr. Neha Jain(Fortis hospital Vasant Kunj) for my wife's maternity. The way she goes into detail of each underlined problem area, be it's organisation of any test details or maintenance of any future tests which not only gives level of comfort to patient/attendant but makes them realise that you are being taken care by such a professional person.

This pandemic situation is a nightmare when someone is going through maternity journey. Dr. Neha and their staff gives proper advise to patient is at ease.

During the complete journey after conceiving to birth of a child she does give proper note of each visits to patient's which helps is guidance for each step of the pregnancy.
She knows how to set an example with such an advise if something needs to be taken care seriously and to be followed by patient. Also if patient is panicking for something which is not really important, she does proper counselling so the patient is at comfort. Also despite having a busy schedule all over the day, while listening or addressing to patient she gives proper ear/advise/time.

Any emergency situation, patient is always the first priority in Dr. Neha's list.

To achieve all the above Dr. Neha has created such a wonderfull team under her with proper training she has given so that the same advise and understanding goes from each line of duty with her team from top to bottom or bottom to top. Without naming them or thanking them it would be incomplete..Ms jyoti, Ms veronica are the team which we came across the journey have always been such a professional behaviour and kind gesture which took us hand in hand.

I really appreciate and thanks a ton to Dr. Neha Jain and her team for the way we are being taken care at hospital.
reply_text: Thanks for your feedback!Your message means a lot to me and my team.We feel encouraged to provide best of health care....congratulations and wish you three a great life!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We are consulting Dr. Neha since early days of pregnancy and shall continue it post delivery. Dr. Neha is ***** *************, experienced, conversant with the treatment & its complicacies in pregnancy. She guided us well during the treatment with regard to relevant tests, proper medicines & injections, diet, exercise, lifestyle modifications, moral boost up. She also guided us well even in the odd hours for our covid-19 treatment during advanced stage of pregnancy (7th month) and assured us for safe delivery of baby during this difficult times of pandemic.  We are highly satisfied with the doctor and shall continue our treatment with Dr.Neha.
reply_text: Thanks for your feedback!Take care and stay blessed!

tags: Wait time,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: My appointment was at 7:30pm on 12th Feb, 2019, Tuesday. I reached the clinic at 7:20pm and there were two people waiting before me to go inside. At 7:45, the doctor had a pregnant couple in her office while I was waiting for my turn outside. Because of UTI (and I was holding my pee since the toilet at the clinic was extremely dirty), I was going through a lot of pain and was hoping for some painkillers or something. At 8:00pm the husband from the couple (inside with the doctor) was talking about his political career and his life back in Bihar and all sorts of irrelevant topics with the doctor. I could hear it because the door of her office was open and I was sitting right outside. Me and my boyfriend were getting impatient as I was almost in tears because of the pain. Ultimately I got up at 8:10 and went inside and politely apologized for interrupting their conversation and asked to speak with the doctor. Then the couple got up and left after greeting the doctor. I was trying to speak and start telling her about my problem when she interrupted me and told her assistant that she must close the door next time a patient walks in so that nobody hears the conversation outside. The consultation wasn't that great because she scared me saying 'kuchh bi ho sakta hai UTI mein'. Then she asked me drop off my sample for tests and the reports are going to come today, when I am already better and back in office. **** ************ *** ******** ****** *** ** ** * ** ******** ******* *** ******** *** *** **** **** ** *** ****

tags: None
review: Doctor was friendly but the experience with receptionist of Cronus multi speciality hospital was not good because it's clearly mentioned that consultation fees is 600 but they asked me to pay 700.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
*** **** ** *** **** ************ * **** ***********.
I have approached Dr. Neha during my wife's pregnancy. She is very polite and experienced. She handled the case from beginning until the delivery. She encouraged us for normal delivery and God blessed me a baby girl under her guidance. She was present at the time of delivery and owned the complete delivery process.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review:
I was blessed with a baby boy three months back. The way Dr. Neha  handled my entire pregnancy and delivery was commendable. She was always available for all my queries.Its about near my delivery date i got pain i didn't sleep holenight properly next morning i visit to Dr Neha she just touch my abdominal pain gone at that moment  i really think in her hand  some magic 
 I would really recommend everyone to refer to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Today we just chatted up and I shared my medical history. I was taken aback by the way she listened to me patiently. The Dr was sensitive and a very good listener. That was something I look forward to. Glad that she was just like that. Tests are scheduled. So nothing else, the environment is warm and welcoming too

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: In short = first she told me that it will cost 15000 ok and after a few minutes she told me 10000 but I had to ask my elders because they are the ones who will paying for my treatment right so I told them that first she said 15000 and then after a few minutes talk she said that it will cost you 10000 so they said ok and then I told dr neha jain that I want to do it then she said it will cost you 15000 and there was also another doctor male doctor who told me it will cost 18000 * **** **** *** ***** **** *********** ***** *** *** **** ** ******* ****** ****
reply_text:
I was trying to help you my best.Everyone in Delhi knows charges of D and C which are around this only.There was disparity in charges because of D and C with anesthesia with ultrasound guidance and without.
I tried my best to help.The male doctor who referred you to me also trying to help you out.
Probably our kindness was misunderstood.We understand your concern.
Charges are decided by hospitals and not by doctors as I only do procedures in hospital.
Still I will continue to treat my patients with full enthusiasm.
God bless!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I met dr neha after my two miscarriages. I had consulted all the top hospitals and best doctor earlier in Delhi , but was really disappointed as none of the doctors gave more than 2-3 mins and none gave proper consultation ... Then one of my friend referred me to Dr. Neha . I was extremely happy to meet her .. She listened to my problems patiently and gave me proper consultation and with god grace I am now 5 months pregnant....  she is very friendly and makes you feel comfortable... i would recommend her to everyone ..
reply_text: Thanks for your feedback!May God bless you and your family always!
